# Templates Documentation - Technical Documentation

## Overview

This directory contains document and code templates for the NoOrg framework. All 42 files are reusable templates.

## Directory Contents (42 files)

Template documentation covering:

- Document templates
- Code templates
- Configuration templates
- Report templates
- Policy templates
- Meeting note templates

## Usage

Templates are used to ensure consistency across:

- Documentation creation
- Code scaffolding
- Configuration management
- Reporting
